title: Sample, "Ribbons", 1957
medium:
Medium: 66% cotoon, 34% linen
Technique: printed on fabric woven in Switzerland
markings: 2 Herman Miller Textiles paper labels attached to lower right corner.
dimensions: 60 cm [23.5"] squared.  Serged on all 4 sides.
description: Overlapping vertical rectangles printed in purple, green, blue, brown and orange on white.
